mapper.select: SELECT user_no, latitude, longitude, record_time FROM user_location WHERE user_no = #{userNo} ORDER BY record_time ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pred_location (user_no,range_50_700, range_700_1500, range_700_plus, zone_level_1, zone_level_2, zone_level_3) VALUES (#{userNo},#{range_50_700},#{range_700_1500},#{range_1500_plus},#{zone_level_1},#{zone_level_2},#{zone_level_3})
mapper.select: SELECT user_no as userNo, range_50_700, range_700_1500, range_1500_plus, zone_level_1 as 30m, zone_level_2 as 60m, zone_level_3 as 90m FROM pred_location WHERE user_no = #{userNo}
